text: Job’s Ninth Speech: A Response to Bildad
Then\f + \fr 26:1 \ft Hebrew “And” \f* Job answered and said,
“How you\f + \fr 26:2 \ft Singular \f* have helped ⸤one who has no power⸥!\f + \fr 26:2 \ft Literally “for not power” \f*
\add How\add* you\f + \fr 26:2 \ft Singular \f* have assisted \add the\add* arm ⸤that has no strength⸥!\f + \fr 26:2 \ft Literally “not strength” \f*
How you\f + \fr 26:3 \ft Singular \f* have advised ⸤one who has no wisdom⸥!\f + \fr 26:3 \ft Literally “for not wisdom” \f*
And \add what\add* sound wisdom you\f + \fr 26:3 \ft Singular \f* have made known ⸤in abundance⸥!\f + \fr 26:3 \ft Literally “as far as the multitude,” or “for multitude” \f*
⸤With whose help⸥\f + \fr 26:4 \ft Literally “With whom” \f* have you\f + \fr 26:4 \ft Singular \f* uttered words,
and whose breath has come forth from you?\f + \fr 26:4 \ft Singular \f*
“The spirits of the dead tremble
below \add the\add* waters and their inhabitants.
Sheol \add is\add* naked before him,
and there is no covering for Abaddon.
He stretches out \add the\add* north over emptiness;
\add he\add* hangs \add the\add* earth ⸤over nothing⸥.\f + \fr 26:7 \ft Literally “over not what” \f*
\add He\add* ties up \add the\add* water in its clouds,
and \add the\add* cloud is not torn open beneath it.\f + \fr 26:8 \ft Hebrew “them”; antecedent for “them” is “water” (literally “waters”) \f*
\add He\add* covers \add the\add* face of \add the\add* full moon;\f + \fr 26:9 \ft Text reads “throne”; “full moon” is based on a change of the vowels \f*
\add he\add* spreads his cloud over it.
⸤He has described a circle⸥\f + \fr 26:10 \ft NRSV; literally “a limit he has circled” \f* on \add the\add* face of \add the\add* water
⸤between light and darkness⸥.\f + \fr 26:10 \ft Literally “at \fq the \ft end of light with darkness” \f*
“\add The\add* pillars of heaven tremble,
and they are astounded at his rebuke.
By his power he stilled the sea,
and by his understanding he struck down Rahab.
By his breath ⸤the heavens were made clear⸥;\f + \fr 26:13 \ft Literally “heavens clearness” \f*
his hand pierced \add the\add* fleeing snake.
Look, these \add are\add* the outer fringes of his ways,
and ⸤how faint is the word⸥\f + \fr 26:14 \ft Literally “how whisper of word” \f* \add that\add* we hear of him!
But\f + \fr 26:14 \ft Hebrew “And” \f* who can understand the thunder of his power?”
